record.darwin:Remarks: The fin clips are from specimens that were Pit tagged and released. The corresponding Pit tag numbers are: 0A00074462, male, 240 mm SL, 274 mm TL, 180 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00074563, male, 208 mm SL, 238 mm TL, 140 g, no visible signs of condition; 0A00075236, male, 199 mm SL, 226 mm TL, 130 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00077201, male, 216 mm SL, 248 mm TL, 180 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00077432, female, 219 mm SL, 249 mm TL, 170 g, no visible signd of condition. The dry specimens are scales and both the scales and the fin clips are separated within the bag/jar by their ID numbers which are the last 5 digits of the Pit tag number.

record.darwin:Remarks: The fin clips are from specimens that were Pit tagged and released. The corresponding Pit tag numbers are: 0A00072311, female, 461 mm SL, 539 mm TL, 1040 g, mucus gone, ripe and running, almost spent; 0A00072733, male, 364 mm SL, 438 mm TL, 770 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00073833, male, 353 mm SL, 426 mm TL, 660 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00074038, male, 382 mm SL, 446 mm TL, 820 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00081206, male, 378 mm SL, 441 mm TL, 690 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00084862, male, 374 mm SL, 434 mm TL, 700 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00085222, male, 386 mm SL, 452 mm TL, 810 g, tubercles, ripe and running; 0A00085307, male, 375 mm SL, 435 mm TL, 770 g, tubercles, ripe and running, cornified scales present. The dry specimens are scales and both the scales and the fin clips are separated within the bag/jar by their ID numbers which are the last 5 digits of the Pit tag number.
